page.title: 13LOCAL POPULATION
page.content: WE FOUND THAT THE MAJORITY OF THE POPULATION IN OUR AREA WERE AGED 5O OR OVER, WITH FEW PEOPLE BETWEEN 2O AND 3O YEARS. THERE ARE FEW VERY YOUNG CHILDREN, MOST BEING AGED 5 UPWARDS. THE CHILDREN OF SCHOOL AGE TRAVELLED AT LEAST ONE MILE TO SCHOOL, USUALLY BY CAR, SOME TRAVELLING AS FAR AS GUILDFORD AND FARNHAM USING PUBLIC TRANSPORT. ABOUT 53% OF THE WORKING POPULATION OF OUR AREA WERE IN EMPLOYMENT IN LONDON AND ABOUT 2O% IN GUILDFORD. MANY OF THEM MADE REGULAR USE OF THE FAST A3 - M25 LINK TO HEATHROW AIRPORT.FEW PEOPLE USED GATWICK BECAUSE OF THE DIFFICULT CROSS COUNTRY JOURNEY INVOLVED. WE WERE INTERESTED TO FIND THAT QUITE A LOT OF WOMEN WORKED AT FULL-TIME JOBS IN OUR AREA TOO, USUALLY FROM CHOICE RATHER THAN NECESSITY.
